title: Pope Francis to travel in US on 'Shepherd One'
content:
That's the Federal Aviation-approved call sign for the Boeing 777 in which he'll be traveling around the United States, according to an official from American Airlines, which will be operating the plane. The papal seal will also be affixed to the side of the aircraft, the only major modification that's planned. 
 
Start the conversation, or Read more at KESQ-TV Palm Desert.
